title: Behrend's trace formula
summary: In algebraic geometry, Behrend's trace formula is a generalization of the Grothendieckâ€“Lefschetz trace formula to a smooth algebraic stack over a finite field conjectured in 1993 [1] and proven in 2003 [2] by Kai Behrend. Unlike the classical one, the formula counts points in the "stacky way"; it takes into account the presence of nontrivial automorphisms.
